item.title: Home buyers are finding the silver lining in a stalled housing market — especially if they’re in this group
item.description: Pending home sales fell in April as buyers pulled back amid economic uncertainty and volatility in the financial markets.

item.title: Salesforce earnings were ‘not bad.’ So why is the stock having its worst day in a year?
item.description: Salesforce’s results weren’t enough to shed lingering growth fears.

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’
